google_play_reviews.replyContent: 300KB is a very safe number, but you should be safe to use something a bit higher. Just be sure to test it after increasing the limit, because if it's too high then MMS won't be able to send! All SMS/MMS apps are forced to compress the attachments - so you should be able to achieve the same level of quality that you get in other apps with QKSMS :)

- Open the conversation
- Click the three dots at the top
- Click "Notifications"
- Click "Notifications" on the new screen that opens

And now you can customize all of the notification settings for that particular conversation :)
